title: How to Make Your Own Vacuum Sealed Storage Bags

steps.headline: Put your linen, blankets or clothing into the extra strong garbage bag.
Pull the open end of the bag together and form a small circle shape.
Place the vacuum cleaner pole into the circle shape and hold it firmly around the pole.
Suck out the air by turning on the vacuum cleaner.
Remove the pole whilst carefully holding the opening tightly together.
Affix a minimum of 6 rubber bands to the seal the opening.

tyn: Clean clothing, linen etc. for storage
text: Put your linen, blankets or clothing into the extra strong garbage bag.  Pull the open end of the bag together and form a small circle shape.  Place the vacuum cleaner pole into the circle shape and hold it firmly around the pole.  Suck out the air by turning on the vacuum cleaner.  Remove the pole whilst carefully holding the opening tightly together.  Affix a minimum of 6 rubber bands to the seal the opening.  Label and place into storage.
sentences: Put your linen, blankets or clothing into the extra strong garbage bag.
Pull the open end of the bag together and form a small circle shape.
Place the vacuum cleaner pole into the circle shape and hold it firmly around the pole.
Suck out the air by turning on the vacuum cleaner.
Remove the pole whilst carefully holding the opening tightly together.
Affix a minimum of 6 rubber bands to the seal the opening.
